fields.name: DisplayMemberError
fields.fieldText: Please add at least one Executive Summary Key Stakeholder as an Elevation Member if Elevation Category is Hot Site.

screens.description: Business Impact to Customer or Illumina reason text field is mandatory when the Impact is selected as Other.
screens.name: SelectReasonError
screens.label: SelectReasonError

fields.name: BusinessImpactCustomerError
fields.fieldText: Business Impact to Customer Reason field is mandatory when Impact is selected as 'Other'.

fields.name: BusinessImpactIlluminaError
fields.fieldText: Business Impact to Illumina field is mandatory when impact is selected as 'Other'.

fields.name: SuccessCriteriaCheck
fields.fieldText: Please update Elevation Owner, Success Criteria, Business Impact to Customer, and Business Impact to Illumina if Elevation Category is Hot Site.

fields.name: Summary_of_Executive_Action_Check_1
fields.fieldText: Please add the Summary of Executive Action when Executive Action Required is Yes

fields.name: Summary_of_Executive_Action_Check_2
fields.fieldText: Please add the Summary of Executive Action when Account Elevation Category is Hot Site

fields.name: UniqueAccElevationError
fields.fieldText: This Work Order already has a Account Elevation. If a new one is required, create a new Business Issue Complaint case AND use the Create Account Elevation button.

fields.name: LimitBusinessImpacttoIlluminaReason
fields.fieldText:
The field Business Impact to Illumina Reason has a character limit of 255 which has been exceeded. Update the text to within the character limit and save.


Go to the previous screen to update the field.

fields.name: LimitBusinessImpacttoCustomerReason
fields.fieldText:
The fields Business Impact to Customer Reason has a character limit of 255 which has been exceeded. Update the text to within the character limit and save.


Go to the previous screen to update the field.
